DOC.brief_summary: This study is examining a birth control patch for 13 cycles (1 year).
DOC.brief_title: Study Investigating the Efficacy and Safety of a Contraceptive Patch for 13 Cycles
DOC.criteria: Requiring contraception Normal cervical smear Maximum age for smokers is 35 History of regular cyclic menstrual periods Pregnancy or lactation Significant skin reaction to transdermal preparations or sensitivity to surgical / medical tape Any disease that may worsen under hormonal treatment (cardiovascular, liver, metabolic) Use of other contraceptive methods than study medication
